state: It's time to explore the amazing world of TextWorld! Here is how to play! First of all, try to travel north. Following that, try to take a trip west. Following that, try to move north. And then, go to the west. Next, go to the south. With that over with, move west. Next, attempt to venture south. Okay, and then, make an effort to venture south. That done, go south. If you can manage that, make an attempt to head south. And then, go south. After that, take a trip west. And then, make an attempt to travel south. Then, go south. Then, pick up the coin from the floor of the restroom. Alright, thanks! -= Canteen =- You find yourself in a canteen. A normal one. The room seems oddly familiar, as though it were only superficially different from the other rooms in the building. There is an unblocked exit to the north. > -= Canteen =-0/1
next_state: -= Salon =- You arrive in a salon. An ordinary one. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Salon =-0/2
